__e: My father's pension is 70 marks a month, if he even gets it.
That means that you, my friends must collect in taxes not 2 gold marks in the pound, but 3!
I send him 10 to 20 marks for cigarettes and coffee.
You think 20 marks is too much for the your room, so what do you say?
He doesn't have to give English lessons for three marks an hour.
And if you wish juice, it will have to be 4 marks extra.
You'll find 50 marks and some change in the desk drawer there.
Harry, Alpha team has no way in so Marks's team have no way out.
Sure, but there's almost 300 marks, a pretty nice sum to get out on a date.
